metadata.title: CVE-2023-30775 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in the libtiff library. This security flaw causesa heap buffer overflow in extractContigSamples32bits, tiffcrop.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiff-tools - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiff5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6').
